Classes in tripleplay.anim that implement Paintable

          Handles creation and management of animations.
 class Flicker
          Implements click, and scroll/flick gestures for a single variable (y position by default).

Uses of Paintable in tripleplay.game
 

Classes in tripleplay.game that implement Paintable
 class AnimScreen
          An abstract screen that will contain animations.

 class ScreenStack
          Manages a stack of screens.

          An abstract screen that contains UI and animations.
